subject: Television
Athletics and Sports
Deaths (Obituaries)
Olympic Games
World Series
lead_paragraph: Mr. Aceti was known for unorthodox camera shots, and his work included the Olympics, the World Series and the Ali-Frazier “Thrilla in Manila.”
snippet: Mr. Aceti was known for unorthodox camera shots, and his work included the Olympics, the World Series and the Ali-Frazier “Thrilla in Manila.”
